title: Lindy Rama-Ellis stuns in a yellow dress at Fashions on the Field launch
text:
The spring racing season is in full swing, with the Melbourne Cup just around the corner.

And race day regular Lindy Rama-Ellis put her best foot forward at Flemington on Wednesday for the launch of Fashions on the Field.

The ex-wife of Olympic swimmer Michael Klim stunned in a yellow sleeveless dress as she posed at the famous racecourse.

Oh, so stylish! Lindy Rama-Ellis put her best foot forward at Melbourne's Flemington Racecourse on Wednesday for the launch of Fashions on the Field

Lindy, 42, accessorised her look with a chic headpiece and designer wristwatch.

The Balinese princess styled her shoulder-length brunette hair in loose waves and opted for an understated makeup look.

The appearance comes after Lindy revealed that she is finally getting along with her ex-husband, Michael.

Simply stunning: The ex-wife of Olympic swimmer Michael Klim stunned in a yellow sleeveless dress as she posed at the famous racecourse

The former couple, who split in 2016 after almost a decade of marriage, have managed to put their differences aside for their sake of their three children: daughters Stella, 13, and Frankie, eight, and son Rocco, 11.

'The relationship Michael and I have is incredible,' she told Stellar magazine recently.

'We have been able to come through such a difficult time, and that's not to say I am going to sugarcoat it.

Details: Lindy, 42, accessorised her look with a chic headpiece and designer wristwatch

Glamazon: The Balinese princess styled her shoulder-length brunette hair in loose waves and opted for an understated makeup look

'We are always going to have difficult moments that come up, but at least we can speak about it as adults and we can just not have the anger behind it anymore.'

Lindy is now married to British property developer Adam Ellis, with whom she shares a 22-month-old daughter named Goldie.

The Melbourne Cup takes place at Flemington Racecourse on Tuesday, 5 November.
